clues.clue: An ancient manuscript, believed to hold secrets of great power, disappeared from a university library.
Mysterious symbols etched into the floor near the manuscript's display, hinting at its significance.
Reports of strange phenomena occurring around the university, such as flickering lights and cold spots.
Multiple cases of sudden and unexplained illnesses among those who had access to the manuscript.
The Ebon Dagger, a priceless artifact with rumored mystical properties, disappeared from a museum exhibit.
Cryptic symbols found at the scene of the artifact's theft, hinting at a possible motive or culprit.
Series of bizarre murders involving victims found with strange markings resembling the dagger's symbols.
Unexplained weather anomalies coinciding with the theft and murders, suggesting supernatural influence.
The Emerald Mask, a valuable historical artifact, vanished from a museum during a special exhibit.
Mysterious notes left behind by the thief, suggesting a deeper motive or hidden agenda.
Reports of strange figures lurking near the museum on the night of the theft, adding to the mystery.
Several museum employees and visitors went missing around the time of the artifact's theft.
